contextId.information: "so that we may present to God every person" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: so that we may present every person

contextId.information: Nothing is excluded or left out of the rule of Christ. AT: "Christ is all important and lives in all his people" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: Christ is all, and is in all
